function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of smartwatch data and self-reported symptoms to detect COVID-19 may lead to false positives or false negatives.","Impact":"Misdiagnosis of COVID-19 and inappropriate actions such as unnecessary quarantine or lack of medical intervention.","Mitigation":"Combine smartwatch data with other diagnostic tests to confirm COVID-19 status before taking action.","Technologies":"Integration of smartwatch data with medical diagnostic tools for comprehensive assessment.","People":"Participants using smartwatches for health monitoring, healthcare professionals interpreting the data.","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations."},{"Description":"Reliance on online detection algorithms may lead to privacy and data security risks for participants' health data.","Impact":"Unauthorized access to sensitive health information, potential misuse of data for discrimination or targeted advertising.","Mitigation":"Implement strong encryption and access controls for online algorithms, obtain informed consent from participants for data use.","Technologies":"Secure data encryption, access control mechanisms, informed consent management systems.","People":"Participants sharing health data online, data security experts, legal and ethical professionals.","Owner":"Research institutions, technology developers."},{"Description":"Overreliance on smartwatch data for COVID-19 detection may lead to overmedicalization and unnecessary interventions.","Impact":"Unwarranted medical treatments, increased healthcare costs, and potential psychological distress for individuals.","Mitigation":"Use smartwatch data as a supplementary tool to clinical diagnosis, emphasize the interpretation of data by qualified healthcare professionals.","Technologies":"Integration of smartwatch data with clinical diagnosis systems, education and training for healthcare professionals on data interpretation.","People":"Healthcare professionals, individuals using smartwatches for health monitoring.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, regulatory bodies."}]}
